In England, in the seven days to 24 March, there were 498,649 new confirmed cases (881.8 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 17 March, there were 455,356 new cases and so the new cases have risen by 10% (43,293 extra cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 29 March is 17,667,861 (31,242.8 cases per 100,000 population).
